results.name: a(n) is the number of steps needed to reach 1 or 89 under iteration of sum-of-squares-of-digits map.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Happy Number
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Unhappy Number
program: a(n) = {my(nb = 0, fn = n); while (! ((n == 1) || (n == 89)), n = f(n); nb++); nb;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 25 2018
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Feb 24 2018
